Now the sons<S>1121</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, (for he was the firstborn<S>1060</S>; but, forasmuch as he defiled<S>2490</S> his father's<S>1</S> bed<S>3326</S>, his birthright<S>1062</S> was given<S>5414</S> unto the sons<S>1121</S> of Joseph<S>3130</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned<S>3187</S> after the birthright<S>1062</S>.
For Judah<S>3063</S> prevailed<S>1396</S> above his brethren<S>251</S>, and of him came the chief ruler<S>5057</S>; but the birthright<S>1062</S> was Joseph's<S>3130</S>:) <sup>chief: or, prince</sup>
The sons<S>1121</S>, I say, of Reuben<S>7205</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> were, Hanoch<S>2585</S>, and Pallu<S>6396</S>, Hezron<S>2696</S>, and Carmi<S>3756</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Joel<S>3100</S>; Shemaiah<S>8098</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Gog<S>1463</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Shimei<S>8096</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Micah<S>4318</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Reaia<S>7211</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Baal<S>1168</S> his son<S>1121</S>,
Beerah<S>880</S> his son<S>1121</S>, whom Tilgathpilneser<S>8407</S> king<S>4428</S> of Assyria<S>804</S> carried away<S>1540</S> captive: he was prince<S>5387</S> of the Reubenites<S>7206</S>. <sup>Tilgathpilneser: or, Tig-lath-pilne-ser, 2.kin.15.29.and 16.7.</sup>
And his brethren<S>251</S> by their families<S>4940</S>, when the genealogy<S>3187</S> of their generations<S>8435</S> was reckoned<S>3187</S>, were the chief<S>7218</S>, Jeiel<S>3273</S>, and Zechariah<S>2148</S>,
And Bela<S>1106</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Azaz<S>5811</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shema<S>8087</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Joel<S>3100</S>, who dwelt<S>3427</S> in Aroer<S>6177</S>, even unto Nebo<S>5015</S> and Baalmeon<S>1186</S>: <sup>Shema: or, Shemaiah</sup>
And eastward<S>4217</S> he inhabited<S>3427</S> unto the entering<S>935</S> in of the wilderness<S>4057</S> from the river<S>5104</S> Euphrates<S>6578</S>: because their cattle<S>4735</S> were multiplied<S>7235</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Gilead<S>1568</S>.
And in the days<S>3117</S> of Saul<S>7586</S> they made<S>6213</S> war<S>4421</S> with the Hagarites<S>1905</S>, who fell<S>5307</S> by their hand<S>3027</S>: and they dwelt<S>3427</S> in their tents<S>168</S> throughout<S>6440</S> all the east<S>4217</S> land of Gilead<S>1568</S>. <sup>throughout: Heb. upon all the face of the east</sup>
And the children<S>1121</S> of Gad<S>1410</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> over against them, in the land<S>776</S> of Bashan<S>1316</S> unto Salchah<S>5548</S>:
Joel<S>3100</S> the chief<S>7218</S>, and Shapham<S>8223</S> the next<S>4932</S>, and Jaanai<S>3285</S>, and Shaphat<S>8202</S> in Bashan<S>1316</S>.
And their brethren<S>251</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S> were, Michael<S>4317</S>, and Meshullam<S>4918</S>, and Sheba<S>7652</S>, and Jorai<S>3140</S>, and Jachan<S>3275</S>, and Zia<S>2127</S>, and Heber<S>5677</S>, seven<S>7651</S>.
These are the children<S>1121</S> of Abihail<S>32</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Huri<S>2359</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Jaroah<S>3386</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Gilead<S>1568</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Michael<S>4317</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Jeshishai<S>3454</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Jahdo<S>3163</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Buz<S>938</S>;
Ahi<S>277</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Abdiel<S>5661</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Guni<S>1476</S>, chief<S>7218</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>.
And they dwelt<S>3427</S> in Gilead<S>1568</S> in Bashan<S>1316</S>, and in her towns<S>1323</S>, and in all the suburbs<S>4054</S> of Sharon<S>8289</S>, upon their borders<S>8444</S>. <sup>their: Heb. their goings forth</sup>
All these were reckoned by genealogies<S>3187</S> in the days<S>3117</S> of Jotham<S>3147</S> king<S>4428</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and in the days<S>3117</S> of Jeroboam<S>3379</S> king<S>4428</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>, and the Gadites<S>1425</S>, and half<S>2677</S> the tribe<S>7626</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, of valiant men<S>2428</S>, men<S>582</S> able to bear<S>5375</S> buckler<S>4043</S> and sword<S>2719</S>, and to shoot<S>1869</S> with bow<S>7198</S>, and skilful<S>3925</S> in war<S>4421</S>, were four<S>702</S> and forty<S>705</S> thousand<S>505</S> seven<S>7651</S> hundred<S>3967</S> and threescore<S>8346</S>, that went out<S>3318</S> to the war<S>6635</S>. <sup>valiant: Heb. sons of valour</sup>
And they made<S>6213</S> war<S>4421</S> with the Hagarites<S>1905</S>, with Jetur<S>3195</S>, and Nephish<S>5305</S>, and Nodab<S>5114</S>.
And they were helped<S>5826</S> against them, and the Hagarites<S>1905</S> were delivered<S>5414</S> into their hand<S>3027</S>, and all that were with them: for they cried<S>2199</S> to God<S>430</S> in the battle<S>4421</S>, and he was intreated<S>6279</S> of them; because they put their trust<S>982</S> in him.
And they took away<S>7617</S> their cattle<S>4735</S>; of their camels<S>1581</S> fifty<S>2572</S> thousand<S>505</S>, and of sheep<S>6629</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S> thousand<S>505</S>, and of asses<S>2543</S> two thousand<S>505</S>, and of men<S>120</S> <S>5315</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> thousand<S>505</S>. <sup>took: Heb. led captive</sup> <sup>men: Heb. souls of men</sup>
For there fell<S>5307</S> down many<S>7227</S> slain<S>2491</S>, because the war<S>4421</S> was of God<S>430</S>. And they dwelt<S>3427</S> in their steads until the captivity<S>1473</S>.
And the children<S>1121</S> of the half<S>2677</S> tribe<S>7626</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> in the land<S>776</S>: they increased<S>7235</S> from Bashan<S>1316</S> unto Baalhermon<S>1179</S> and Senir<S>8149</S>, and unto mount<S>2022</S> Hermon<S>2768</S>.
And these were the heads<S>7218</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>, even Epher<S>6081</S>, and Ishi<S>3469</S>, and Eliel<S>447</S>, and Azriel<S>5837</S>, and Jeremiah<S>3414</S>, and Hodaviah<S>1938</S>, and Jahdiel<S>3164</S>, mighty<S>1368</S> men<S>582</S> of valour<S>2428</S>, famous<S>8034</S> men<S>582</S>, and heads<S>7218</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>. <sup>famous: Heb. men of names</sup>
And they transgressed<S>4603</S> against the God<S>430</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>, and went a whoring<S>2181</S> after<S>310</S> the gods<S>430</S> of the people<S>5971</S> of the land<S>776</S>, whom God<S>430</S> destroyed<S>8045</S> before<S>6440</S> them.
And the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> stirred up<S>5782</S> the spirit<S>7307</S> of Pul<S>6322</S> king<S>4428</S> of Assyria<S>804</S>, and the spirit<S>7307</S> of Tilgathpilneser<S>8407</S> king<S>4428</S> of Assyria<S>804</S>, and he carried them away<S>1540</S>, even the Reubenites<S>7206</S>, and the Gadites<S>1425</S>, and the half<S>2677</S> tribe<S>7626</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, and brought<S>935</S> them unto Halah<S>2477</S>, and Habor<S>2249</S>, and Hara<S>2024</S>, and to the river<S>5104</S> Gozan<S>1470</S>, unto this day<S>3117</S>.
